trans-unit.source: Provides a strongly typed collection of <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessThread"></xref> objects.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessThreadCollection"></xref> class, with no associated <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessThread"></xref> instances.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessThreadCollection"></xref> class, using the specified array of <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessThread"></xref> instances.
An array of <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessThread"></xref> instances with which to initialize this <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessThreadCollection"></xref> instance.
Appends a process thread to the collection.
The thread to add to the collection.
The zero-based index of the thread in the collection.
Determines whether the specified process thread exists in the collection.
A module is identified by its module name and its fully qualified file path.
A <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessThread"></xref> instance that indicates the thread to find in this collection.
`true` if the thread exists in the collection; otherwise, `false`.
Copies an array of <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessThread"></xref> instances to the collection, at the specified index.
An array of <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessThread"></xref> instances to add to the collection.
The location at which to add the new instances.
Provides the location of a specified thread within the collection.
The <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessThread"></xref> whose index is retrieved.
The zero-based index that defines the location of the thread within the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessThreadCollection"></xref>.
Inserts a process thread at the specified location in the collection.
The zero-based index indicating the location at which to insert the thread.
The thread to insert into the collection.
Gets an index for iterating over the set of process threads.
The zero-based index value of the thread in the collection.
A <xref href="System.Diagnostics.ProcessThread"></xref> that indexes the threads in the collection.
Deletes a process thread from the collection.
The thread to remove from the collection.
